Emulator for Atari 5200 by Petr Stehlik[CR]Supported files: xfd|atr|atx|cdm|cas|bin|a52|xex|zip[CR][CR]Game Addon Notes: (!) 5200.rom (md5): 281f20ea4320404ec820fb7ec0693b38[CR][CR]BIOS files are required for this core to function correctly

Emulator for MSX/SVI/ColecoVision/SG-1000 by Daniel Vik[CR]Supported files: rom|ri|mx1|mx2|col|dsk|cas|sg|sc|m3u[CR][CR]Game Addon Notes: (!) The libretro port of blueMSX requires the BIOS files|from full standalone package inside the 'System\Machines' directory |and media database files into 'System\Databases' directory.|https://docs.libretro.com/library/bluemsx/#bios|(!) ColecoVision Gamepad Mapping is as follow:|Button 1 as Retropad A|Button 2 as Retropad B|Dial keys 1 to 8 as X, Y, R, L, R2, L2, R3, L3|Star as Select, Hash as Start|0 & 9 are on keyboard 1 & 2 for Player 1|0 & 9 are on keyboard 3 & 4 for Player 2.|(!) To play SpectraVideo cassettes type 'cload' then 'run'|or BLOAD ''CAS:'',R depending of game.
